title: My smurf has been permantly banned {PLS HELP}
body:
Hey riot, my smurf account has been played by a friend and permanently banned! 
the other day i wasn't winning much on my actual account so i decided to  hop on my lower elo account AKA Threekardes only to see i was permanently banned and i thought it was a bug or something because it showed that i was toxic but i  am always positive on Lol and you can even check my main account One Letter Shor. some proof that it is my account is that they are both made from the same email and my main acc first name was also very similar to Threekardes.  so i was wondering how i could get it unbanned and how you guys can help me out with this situation.  I have also spent a lot of  money on this account ( $200+) and a lot of effort and time to get to where it is. {{champion:92}} Please don't let all the money i saved up go to waste because i am still in high school and  i don't even have a job so i put a lot of hard work to earn that money and now that i have found out it is permanently banned i am really upset.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Account sharing is strictly against Riot's ToS/EuLA and is bannable by itself.

Any activity taken on your account is **YOUR** responsibility.
well isn't there something that can be done so i can get my account unbanned srsly?

0 chance in you getting your account back sorry.

As Seph stated, account sharing is a bannable offence in itself.
not even next season or anything ?
